"Walk with me." Sam said in a friendly manner, but it was clear that it was not a suggestion. You followed him through a hidden doorway down a candle-lit stone hall. "It's really disappointing that you do not wish to undertake the trials. We have not had any new members since..." Sam's voice trailed off.

"Since...?"

"Since my wife disappeared." Sam said dejectedly. Then, without prompting, and with a tear in his eye, he continued. "Nef was my soul. She was fiery, beautiful, and when she ascended she was the most cunning of us all. Her performance during the trials was unmatched. But, she got overconfident."

"What happened then?" You were enthralled by Sam's story, and it actually pained you to see him in such a state.

"She entered a forbidden place. The curse destroyed her soul, and she was lost to us forever. This is all we have left of her - memories." Sam pointed to a small shrine containing a picture of a beautiful woman, lovingly decorated with candles, incense and flowers of many varieties. She was pretty, you thought. Striking golden eyes, purple hair and a youthful face adorned with three rubies - two in her ears, and one on her forehead.

Looking at Nef's picture, you felt a strange sensation well up inside you. Almost as if... you closed your eyes and felt something strange. A will. Somehow you just knew that if you wanted, you could channel whatever was left of Nef's soul. So you did.

Your eyes still closed, you felt your form begin to shift. Your face morphed into that which you saw on the picture. Your skin paled, then took on a lightly tanned color. Your hair spiraled up until it spiked out in several directions. A chill went over your body as your clothes began to shrink, molding into a two-piece bikini held together by - you gulped at the cold sensation on your skin - two gold hoops on your hips and one on your chest. More hoops formed on your wrists, except they were heavy. Finally, you felt your chest inflate slightly and your crotch shrink until you were sure that you were definitely female down there.

You open your eyes to a purple strand of hair tickling your nose, and Sam's bewildered expression looking at you.

"Nef..." he breathed. "I thought I'd lost you!" Before you could react, he ran up and embraced you. Even though you were ghosts, you could feel his bare chest against yours. It wasn't an unpleasant feeling. "You wouldn't believe how delighted I am to see you again, Nef. To gaze into your eyes, to feel the softness of your skin. You're even wearing the gifts I brought you the day before your last day with us!"

Then, Sam took a step back. "Wait... I must not give in to deception. This cannot be true. If you really are Nef, then you will know the source of the gems in your adornments."

You opened your mouth, about to say that you weren't Nef and were just trying to comfort Sam. Except that almost unbidden, memories flooded your mind. And feelings that definitely weren't originally yours. "My love, of course you have every right to be suspicious. But it is me - at least, my soul. And the gems were taken from the ground under your palace, when you still reigned. Your trusted advisor Amun crafted them himself as tribute to your wisdom and my beauty."

Sam's stoic stance melted as he wept. You comforted him as best you could, until he pulled himself together. Then, looking around, you saw there was no one but you two there. Almost instinctively, you began to dance. Your hips shook from side to side, feet tiptoeing an entrancing pattern as your hands waved as if in a breeze. Sam looked up and grinned. You - Nef - had danced for him like this on many an occasion. Your hands moved to your hips, caressing your new soft stomach while seductively looking at Sam.

"Maybe I'll take you to bed later, my love" you said. But, you did have an alterior motive. "But first, one thing. There was mention of trials for this one's body. You know how malleable a soul is better than most - and since I've passed the trials before, is it really necessary?"

"Of course not, dearest." Sam replied instantly and without hesitation. "Why should you need to repeat that which you helped initiate? You're more than welcome to resume your rightful seat at my side in this Order".

Perfect, you thought. You were in. "Oh thank you!" you flashed Sam one of what you assumed was Nef's best smiles. At least, the memories you had somehow inherited lead you to believe that.

"Now we must celebrate, for the curse has been lifted!" Sam proclaimed. "I'll let everyone know, and we shall gather in the square tomorrow." With that, Sam left the secret chamber in very high spirits.

Once out of sight, you focused on your own form. Nothing happened. You seemed to be stuck as Nef. But, was that even so bad? Nef was very pretty, and very powerful. Plus you were able to possess people, so it wasn't like you were locked out of life forever.

Gathering your courage to go and meet the other members - with you being freshly 're-instated', you follow Sam's trail and step out into the antechamber where everyone else was waiting.

"STOP!" she yelled "we can have the hero go without his true reward" she said smiling.

she stepped off from the sofa and placed herself on her knees in front off you. before you could say anything she grabbed hold of your dick and forced it deep within her moth. her tongue melted on it, leaving hot sloppy marks. all you could hear was the sounds of gulping and gagging as she continued to pump away with her lips. you felt yourself about to explode and began to take you dick out off her mouth before it was too late. she grabbed a hold of your waist and pulled you back in, she wanted this. she sucked away harder and harder, wrapping her tongue around your throbbing cock, before long you shot out your hot sticky substance all inside of her mouth before collapsing back on the sofa. she simply smiled at you, her lips now soaked with your hot cum. she too crawled back onto the sofa and passed out. you began to feel yourself drift away and before long you too fell asleep.
13111222122122.title: she has an idea.

131112221221221.content: You clutched ahold of your head as you began to wake back up. Some time had passed maybe roughly an hour or so, you begin to look around the room and notice your mother still disguised as the egyptian queen lasy there on the sofa beside you. She was still asleep for now, her boy exposed as she didnt have enough tike to re-dress after what you two had gotten up to. You sat there for a moment before?
131112221221221.title: you wake up, the morphed queen still beside you.

1311122212212212.content:
You began to think back about why and how your mother had transformed like that. Not only could she change her appearence but she had the ability to alter her personallity too. You began to wonder what the purpose of these powers was, but before you could get anywhere your fathers spirit once again re-appeared. "Ah there you two are!" He exclaimed as he drifted towards you. "You can morph too cant you?" You asked him before he came any closer. "Well yeah, but i can do more than that. I think ive got it all figured out." He proudly boasted.

"You see, these morphing powers of ours can make us visible to certain people. I think were supposed to use them as a disguise to other spirits and people" he began to explain. For once, one of your fathers ideas began to make sense to you."you become disguised because you become their spirit, let me explain. We look like us because we are the spirits of our bodies, but when we transform we become other bodys spirits." He continued to ramble. "We can use these abilities to disguise ourselves and ultimatly become the people were disguised as" he explained finnaly finishing his theory. You began to somewhat doubt his idea, the doubt now consuming your facial expression.

"Fine, ill prove it to you" your father said. He closed his eyes and took in a deep breath. His body began to slowly change just as your mothers had earlier. His hair turned to a silky brown and began to fall to his exposed lower back, his hieght shrunk a fair bit as his clothes began to retract leaving only a cloth bikin covering him in a semi-transparent silk cloth. The cloth bikini was the only thing cover his newly formed breasts that lay bare upon his much smaller chest. His features become far softer and before long the person standing in front of you was no longer your father. "See, this is that princess that everyone on the news keeps going on about. I look just like her, in fact like this i could fool people into thinking im her. When were done disguising ourselves as them we can take over there bodys like this and have everything!" He explained smashing any doubts you had.
1311122212212212.title: Your dad returns.

131112221222.content:
Kal smirked, his patience running out, "Moron, doesn't know the first thing a man in his position should be doing. Well I can't blame the Lessers, when put in a position they don't belong it makes sense they can't decide what to do." With a forgiving sigh Kal waves his hand, he possesses the rich man. The man coughs to interrupt his date "Sorry. I'm going to have to use the restroom, be back in a tic." Kal said putting on a smirk. The date look confused, not really sure where this strange new posture the man had, with an almost unnaturally sense of purpose Kal pushed passed a man trying to walk out, the man simply looked shaken, before slinking off back to the bar. Kal sighed "Honestly somebody like this shouldn't be bother with trash like that. Ah well. Let's see what I can do to get out of this date." Kall focused his immense energies once again, a copy appeared next to him "Well we can't leave this so soon." The copy remarked

Kal sighed "I suppose, giving up's just not something I can stomach like most men." Kal remarked

"Most real men." Kal's clone added with a snide look on his face

"Can't let on too much about the change, this poor sap's not the best speaker." Kal explained

"Oh really, I think a helping hand couldn't hurt? And you know me, always the perfectionist." Clone Kal chided his original self.

"Well get out there then." Kal said

"Me? What am I supposed to do out there?" Clone Kal asked

Faking a tired sigh Kal looks at his clone "Yeah I guess we don't need her." Kal remarked, eyeing his clone wantonly

"Hehe, flattered but I'd expect myself of all people to know I don't swing that way." Clone Kal added sauntering about the bathroom

Kal groaned in annoyance "I should have known that I of all people would never compromise. Damn, my high stanards."

Clone Kal laughed "Many would consider it a curse. Oh well, what can you do?" The clone asked snidely

Kal took a hard step forward getting in his clone's face. "I'm very glad you asked that. I don't give up and I'm not into men. So clearly something else must by done to fix this." Kal focused his powers. With a flash Kal transformed into a woman.

Clone Kal wavered his hand "Could be better." He chided

Kal cocked a grin "If that were anybody but me I'd slap my own ignorant face. Just watch me, big boy." Kal threw ran her slender fingers through her shining hair, as clone Kal watched, the shining locks grew in length, hanging and curling beautifully around Kal's shoulders. Kal looked purposefully at Clone Kal who kept his dismissive pout.

Kal shook her hips, the suit pants slide off her hips showing a lilac skirt. Standing bellow the golden trim were two golden high heels, filled out by creamy colored calves, Kal posed with her legs apart with a confident look

Clone Kal shrugged "Not bad. But I shouldn't have to remind myself that good is the enemy of great. This can't be the limit to my own potential as a beautiful woman?"

"You think I'm done? You should give yourself some credit, it's the least I owe myself." Kal said confidently. Kal started to undo the suit jacket, revealing the rest of the lilac dress, with a modest knot belt with a gold buckle with a sparkling ruby, her fingernails shined with perfectly manicured nails neatly coated in wine red nail polish. She put her hands over her shoulders and two beautiful ruby earrings reflected the bathroom's light. "A woman of my status wouldn't normally do this. But I'm rather smitten with you." Kal spoke in a completely different voice. Clone Kal watched as Kal subtly wiggled her hips in need

Clone Kal was finally getting hot under the collar "Quite a stunning choice, but why the royalty?" Clone Kal asked

Kal laughed good heartedly "I shouldn't have to explain to myself what I'd want from a perfect woman." Kal remarked

"Perfect? Quite the claim, but can I live up to it?" Clone Kal asked Kal

Kal looked offended "Me? And just what have you to offer to a woman such as myself? Look at yourself, were a photogropher here he couldn't get anything without a studio of lighting equipment!" Kal scoffed at Clone Kal

"Dost the lady prostest? Perhaps I'll discard it then." Clone Kal said taking off the suit jacket.

But Kal's girlish protests did not cease "A plain dress shirt? Are you a man on the town or are you an army private trying to blend into the wall paper?" Kal asked faking outrage "And such shoes are relics of a year's worth of fashion hubris!" Kal remarked

"Very well, I'll have no choice but to discard them." Clone Kal said taking them off

"Plain black socks? Not even monogram. How oafish! To think you could approach a lady like myself in such pleabian attire." Kal scoffed

Clone Kal put his arms around Kal with a wanton look in his eye "Then if I could be so bold to ask you to dress me!" Clone Kal said panting with desire

"How simple. A suppose it is only for the best a lady like myself were to decide what a man of your standing should wear. Not like you could know what to do with yourself." Kal remarked

"Anything, for the approval of such a fine lady, and a queen no less." Clone Kal said, his lips closing into Kal's plump peach colored lips

"Well, how could I say no when you grovel so properly. But first and foremest. You have to give me something that I want." Kal grab's Clone Kal's thighs "And I think you already know what that is." Kal said, animal need clear in her ruby colored eyes

"Such a lady to propose something like that?" Clone Kal remarked
131112221222.title: sure, dad.
